text: Evañca sā bhikkhunī bhikkhunīhi vuccamānā tatheva paggaṇheyya sā bhikkhunī bhikkhunīhi yāvatatiyaṃ samanubhāsitabbā tassa paṭinissaggāya
edit: Evañca sā bhikkhunī bhikkhunīhi vuccamānā tatheva paggaṇheyya sā bhikkhunī bhikkhunīhi yāvatatiyaṃ samanubhāsitabbā tassa paṭinissaggāya

translations.transtext: And should that bhikkhunī, thus admonished by the bhikkhunīs, persist as before, the bhikkhunīs are to rebuke her up to three times for the sake of relinquishing that.
